text: 12.7: FG 13.1; Ga 6.6; 1 T 5.17Maaŋ muuŋgip, guma the ana Fhe Bakɨmen gumgi gu mbigir kurkurarga tɨv ki, ana guigira harigi gumgi gu mbigir kurkurari. Maaŋ muuŋgip, Fhe Bakɨme guma mbe ana won ŋaara muun zav ana harigi gumgi gu mbigi khɨvi ndɨkndɨgar ana nɨɨŋgi, ana guigira harigi gumgi gu mbigi khɨvɨri.
